metadata.title: FindMyTherapy – Find the Right Psychotherapy in Austria
metadata.description: The leading platform for psychotherapists in Austria. Find the right therapy with AI-powered matching – anonymous, free, and easy to understand.
metadata.keywords: Psychotherapy, Find Therapists, Austria, Mental Health, Psychologists, Therapy Matching

hero.title: We find the right therapy for you.

hero.ctaHint: Find the right therapy in just a few minutes

accessibility.title: Full Accessibility

performance.title: Lightning Fast
performance.description: Optimized for best Core Web Vitals

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Still have questions? Email us at
faq.a1: Yes, everything is free for you: matching, therapist search, and guides. Costs only arise directly with the therapist for therapy sessions – you can see these fees transparently in each profile.
faq.a2: You answer simple questions about your situation and preferences in about 5 minutes. Our system then finds the therapists that best match you – based on specialization, therapy style, and practical factors.
faq.q3: How do I find the right therapist?
faq.a3: We only show you verified therapists with real available capacity. You can filter by topic, location, format (online/in-person), and availability. Our matching helps you find not just any therapist, but the right one.
faq.a4: Yes. All data is encrypted and stored on EU servers in compliance with GDPR. You decide whether and with whom you share your results – no one sees your data without your permission.
faq.q5: I need help immediately – what should I do?
faq.a5: In an acute crisis, we immediately show you Austrian crisis hotlines (e.g., Telefonseelsorge 142) and emergency medical contacts. FindMyTherapy does not replace the emergency number 144 in emergencies.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Real voices from people who found their way to the right therapy.

user1.name: Lisa M.
user1.quote: I finally understood which type of therapy suits me. The matching process was simple and respectful.

user2.name: Markus W.
user2.quote: After years of searching, I found the right therapist through FindMyTherapy. The process was pleasant and discreet.

therapist1.name: Dr. Anna B.
therapist1.quote: As a therapist, I appreciate the quality of the matching. The platform brings together people who truly fit each other.

user3.name: Sophie K.
user3.quote: I was skeptical, but the matching exceeded my expectations. I finally feel understood.

therapist2.name: Mag. Thomas R.
therapist2.quote: The platform takes a lot of organizational work off my hands and I can focus on what matters: my patients.

user4.name: Julia H.
user4.quote: The first step was so hard. FindMyTherapy made it easier. Thank you for this valuable support.

screening.title: Quick Safety Check
screening.subtitle: Before we begin, we want to ensure we can offer you the right support.
screening.notice: Your answers are not stored and are only used to provide you with the best help.
screening.question1: Are you currently having thoughts of hurting yourself or taking your life?
screening.question2: In the past 2 weeks, have you thought that it would be better if you were no longer alive?
screening.canProceed: Thank you. You can now continue with the matching.
screening.crisisDetected: We want to connect you with immediate help.
screening.supportSubtitle: It takes courage to share this. Here's immediate support.
screening.hotlineDesc: Free and anonymous – someone is always there for you.
screening.noJudgment: You can come back anytime. Your choice, no pressure.

crisis.title: You Are Not Alone
crisis.subtitle: It takes courage to be here. There are people who can help you.
crisis.immediateHelp: Please reach out to a crisis hotline now.
crisis.notAlone: Trained counselors are available around the clock.
crisis.additionalInfo: These services are free and anonymous. You can call anytime.
crisis.alternativeText: When you feel better, you can return anytime.
crisis.helpAvailable: If you're in crisis, please reach out to professional help.

intensity.title: How much is this affecting you?
intensity.subtitle: Describe the intensity for each topic - select statements or describe in your own words.
intensity.optional: These details are optional and can be skipped.
intensity.describeInstead: Or describe it in your own words
intensity.describePlaceholder: e.g. It affects me especially strongly when...
intensity.weightedExplanation: Weighted average based on topic priority

depression.daily: I feel sad or empty almost every day
depression.sleep: My sleep is significantly disrupted (too much or too little)
depression.work: I can barely manage my work or daily activities
depression.isolation: I withdraw from friends and family
depression.hopeless: I see little hope for the future

anxiety.daily: I have anxiety feelings almost every day
anxiety.avoid: I avoid certain situations because of my anxiety
anxiety.physical: I have physical symptoms like racing heart or sweating
anxiety.work: My anxiety significantly limits my daily life

family.daily: Family conflicts burden me almost daily
family.communication: Communication in my family is very difficult
family.avoidance: I avoid contact with certain family members
family.children: The situation also affects my children or other family members

relationships.daily: Relationship problems occupy me almost daily
relationships.communication: We have communication problems in the relationship
relationships.separation: I'm thinking about separation or going through one

burnout.exhausted: I feel permanently exhausted, even after rest
burnout.cynical: I have an increasingly cynical attitude toward my work
burnout.physical: I have physical complaints due to stress
burnout.weekend: Even on weekends, I can't really switch off anymore

trauma.flashbacks: I have flashbacks or intrusive memories
trauma.avoid: I avoid places, people, or situations that remind me
trauma.sleep: I have nightmares or sleep problems because of what happened
trauma.trust: I have difficulty trusting other people
trauma.daily: What I experienced strongly affects my daily life

addiction.control: I feel like I'm losing control over my behavior
addiction.daily: I think about it daily or do it daily
addiction.withdrawal: I have withdrawal symptoms when I stop
addiction.hide: I hide my behavior from others

eating.thoughts: Thoughts about food or weight constantly occupy me
eating.control: I feel like I can't control my eating behavior
eating.physical: I have physical complaints due to my eating behavior

adhd.organize: Organization and planning are very difficult for me
adhd.impulsive: I often act impulsively and regret it later
adhd.work: My concentration problems affect my work

selfcare.neglect: I often neglect my own needs

stress.control: I feel helplessly at the mercy of my stress

sleep.falling: It takes me a long time to fall asleep
sleep.staying: I often wake up during the night
sleep.daily: My sleep problems affect my daily life
sleep.medication: I take medication or substances to fall asleep

personalized.experienceMatch: Has {years} years of experience with similar cases

transparency.title: Why this match?
transparency.howWeCalculate: How we calculate the match score
transparency.calcExplanation1: Our algorithm analyzes multiple factors to find the best fit:
transparency.calcFactor1: Specialization: Does the expertise match your topics?
transparency.calcFactor2: Experience: Does the therapist have experience with similar intensity?
transparency.calcFactor3: Practical criteria: Do location, insurance, and session type match?
transparency.calcFactor4: Profile quality: Is the profile complete and verified?
transparency.calcExplanation2: The more factors match, the higher the score. Therapists with higher scores appear higher.

howItWorks.title: How We Find Your Match
howItWorks.subtitle: A personal process in 5 steps

step1.title: You tell us about yourself
step1.description: What topics are you dealing with? What's weighing on you? Your answers stay confidential.

step2.title: We understand your needs
step2.description: Do you prefer an empathetic or direct style? Online or in-person? We listen carefully.

step3.title: We search our network
step3.description: Hundreds of qualified therapists with various specializations and experience levels.

step4.title: We calculate the fit
step4.description: Specialization, therapy style, experience and practical factors – we find who truly fits you.

step5.title: Your personal top matches
step5.description: The therapists with the highest compatibility, sorted by your individual fit.

howItWorks.closing: You're on the right path. The first step is often the most important.

feedback.title: How was your experience?
feedback.description: Your feedback helps us find better matches.
feedback.foundMatch: Did you find someone who fits you?
feedback.thankYouMessage: Your feedback helps us improve our service.

hero.title: Therapy doesn't start with a list – it starts with understanding.
hero.subtitle: We help people find the right therapy. Not just any therapist – but the right form of therapy, at the right time, for the right person.

conviction.title: Our Conviction
conviction.paragraph1: The right therapy is more important than the 'best' therapist. People often don't know what they need – and that's completely okay.
conviction.paragraph2: Therapy is a process, not a filter problem. That's why we founded FindMyTherapy: to provide orientation before the search begins.
conviction.paragraph3: Orientation is the first therapeutic step.

team.title: The People Behind FindMyTherapy
team.subtitle: Experience meets fresh perspectives. Science meets heart.
team.note: Supported by a dedicated team of developers, designers, and specialists

gregor.name: MMag. Dr. Gregor Studlar BA
gregor.title: Clinical Psychologist & Psychotherapist
gregor.bio: Gregor brings over 15 years of clinical experience. His expertise in cognitive behavioral therapy, especially for anxiety disorders, depression, and burnout, forms the scientific foundation of FindMyTherapy.

thomas.name: Thomas Kaufmann, BA pth.
thomas.title: Psychotherapist in Training under Supervision
thomas.bio: As a former paramedic, Thomas knows how important quick, pragmatic help is. His solution-oriented approach shapes the user-friendliness of FindMyTherapy.

features.title: What Makes FindMyTherapy Special
features.subtitle: We're not a directory. We're your companion on the way to the right therapy.

matching.title: Guided Matching
matching.description: You'll be guided step by step through the process. No overwhelming forms. No endless lists. We take you by the hand and find the right therapy together.

knowledge.title: Evidence-Based Knowledge
knowledge.description: Scientifically grounded articles, written and reviewed by real psychotherapists.

search.title: Modern Search
search.description: Filter by specialization, location, availability and more – simple and intuitive.

rightTherapy.title: The Right Therapy
rightTherapy.description: Not just finding therapists – but understanding which form of therapy fits you.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Sacred to Us
privacy.subtitle: We take this very seriously.
privacy.description: Mental health is a sensitive topic. We understand that. That's why we built FindMyTherapy from the ground up with privacy at its core. No compromises.

therapists.title: We Take the Website Off Your Hands
therapists.subtitle: A professional online presence is important. But you have more important things to do. We create an SEO-optimized microsite with your own link.

cta.title: You're not alone. And you don't have to do this by yourself.
cta.subtitle: The first step is the hardest. But we're here to make it easier.

meta.title: For Therapists – More Visibility Without Technical Hassle
meta.description: Reach more clients with your own SEO-optimized microsite. FindMyTherapy handles discoverability, structure, and matching.

hero.title: More Visibility. Less Admin. Focus on Therapy.
hero.subtitle: We take care of your online presence so you can focus on what really matters: your clients.

benefits.title: Why Therapists Choose Us
benefits.subtitle: We take the burden of online presence off your shoulders – for more time with your clients.

visibility.title: Maximum Visibility
visibility.description: Your profile is automatically optimized for search engines. Get found without being an SEO expert.

matching.title: Targeted Matching
matching.description: Our system connects you with clients who match your specializations and methods.

focus.title: Focus on Therapy

howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to your professional online presence

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Fill in your profile – specializations, methods, availability. As simple as filling out a form.

step2.title: Customize Your Microsite
step2.description: Choose colors and content for your personal page. No technical skills required.

step3.title: Reach Clients
step3.description: Get found, receive inquiries, and see your statistics in real-time.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade when you're ready

1.quote: Finally a platform that understands what therapists need. No tech stress, just works.
1.author: Dr. Maria S.

2.quote: Since joining FindMyTherapy, I receive significantly more matching inquiries. The matching really works.
2.author: Thomas K.

3.quote: The statistics show me exactly how my profile is performing. This helps me develop my practice strategically.
3.author: Lisa M.

1.question: Is FindMyTherapy really free?
1.answer: Yes, the basic profile is permanently free. You can upgrade to Basic or Premium at any time to unlock more features.

2.question: How does matching work?
2.answer: Clients answer questions about their needs. Our system matches these with your specializations, methods, and availability and shows you to matching clients.

3.question: Do I need technical skills?
3.answer: No! Everything is as simple as filling out a form. We take care of SEO, hosting, and all technical details.

4.question: Can I change my profile anytime?
4.answer: With Basic or Premium, you can update your profile at any time. Changes are immediately visible on your microsite.

5.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
5.answer: You can cancel anytime in your dashboard. Access remains until the end of the billing period, then you automatically switch to the free profile.

cta.title: Ready to Reach More Clients?
cta.subtitle: Start free now and see for yourself.
